index.head: CHECK YOUR UNDERSTANDING
index.screenText:
Select the appropriate options.
Q5. Which of the following linear functions accurately represents the line in the graph below?
index.FeedbackIncorrect:
Not Quite!

The Correct Answer is: Option C

Read the explanation below to clear your understanding.
The x coordinates of all points on a vertical line are the same. Therefore, vertical lines are represented in the form x = constant value (c).
The slope of a vertical line is undefined as there can be no changes in the value of the x coordinates.
Thus in this example, the linear function is:
x = 4.
index.FeedbackCorrect:
That's Correct

The Answer is: Option C

Read the explanation below to validate your answer.
The x coordinates of all points on a vertical line are the same. Therefore, vertical lines are represented in the form x = constant value (c).
The slope of a vertical line is undefined as there can be no changes in the value of the x coordinates.
Thus in this example, the linear function is:
x = 4.
